content.question: Which of the following describes the activities of multinational corporations operating in the oil industry in Nigeria?

choices.label: Multinational corporations have promoted the nationalization of Nigerian oil.
Money paid by multinational corporations to the Nigerian government has led to the elimination of corruption.
Most multinational corporations are in northern Nigeria, so payments are not distributed equally across the country.
Multinational corporations have facilitated corruption in Nigeria and the government’s dependency on money from oil.

content.answer: Multinational corporations have facilitated corruption in Nigeria and the government’s dependency on money from oil.
